It's a bit of a longread, but this thread by Christine is a marvelous journey, and continuation from "Is Bluesky federated?", about decentralization and distributed networks. It includes definitions, RFCs from 60 years ago and a bunch of humor.

https://social.coop/@cwebber/113647312428959527
